elongatedParticles.step-2-description: Fill in all the fields below
elongatedParticles.step-3-description: These are the results of your experiment. Remember to save it so you can access them later
elongatedParticles.ratio: Ratio between the particle's smallest and biggest dimensions
elongatedParticles.sample_mass: SoilSample mass (g) or number of particles in the sample
elongatedParticles.mass: Mass (g) or number of passing particles in the smallest pachymeter proportional opening
elongatedParticles.error.null-dimensions: Invalid values in the dimensions table
elongatedParticles.warning.criterion-1_5: In the 1:5 criterion, the elongated and flattened particles percentage should be a maximum of 10% for it to be used in asphalt mixtures
